original: Junger, Henrik Bertil, civilingenjör, Halmstad, f. 20/4/11 i Gbg-av K. H. J. o. Ingrid Almström. G. 37 m. Britta Ek. Barn: Britten f. 38, Carin 42, Lars Håkan 46. — Stud:ex. i Landskrona 29, stud. v. KTH (maskinbyggn. o. mek. tekn.) 30-34. Konstrukt. v. Waplans Mek. Verkst. A-B i Nälden 34-35, v. A-B Landsverk i Landskrona 35, v. A-B Finshyttans Bruk 35-40, ritkont :chef v. A-B Kris-tenson & Grähs i Stblm 41, chefsassist. v. Halmstads Nya Verkst. A-B 42-44, disp. där sed. 45.
translated: Junger, Henrik Bertil, engineer, from Halmstad, born on April 20th, 1911 in Gothenburg to K.H.J. and Ingrid Almström. Married in 1937 to Britta Ek. Children: Britten born in 1938, Carin born in 1942, Lars Håkan born in 1946. He graduated from high school in Landskrona in 1929 and studied mechanical engineering at KTH from 1930-1934. He worked as a designer at Waplans Mekanical Workshop AB in Nälden from 1934-1935, at AB Landsverk in Landskrona in 1935, at AB Finshyttans Bruk from 1935-1940, as a drawing office manager at AB Kristenson & Grähs in Stockholm in 1941, as an assistant manager at Halmstad's Nya Verkstad AB from 1942-1944, and as a manager there since 1945.
